1.text: Preheat the oven to 400 °F (204 °C) and make an egg wash.

3.text: Add the Worcestershire, Tabasco, thyme, and sausage to the bowl.

5.text: Roll 2 thawed puff pastry sheets into 2 large rectangles.

6.text: Divide the sausage mixture between the 2 rectangles.

7.text: Place the sausage on the pastry and fold the pastry over.

8.text: Cut each pastry roll into 8 to 10 individual sausage rolls.

9.text: Put the rolls on a baking sheet and bake them for 15 to 20 minutes.

10.text: Preheat the oven to 400 °F (204 °C) and get out the puff pastry.

11.text: Roll each puff pastry sheet into a large rectangle.

12.text: Cut each rectangle into 8 small rectangles.

13.text: Beat 1 egg and cut 8 short sausages in half lengthwise.

14.text: Brush the ends of the rectangles with egg and arrange the sausages.

15.text: Sprinkle salt, pepper, and thyme over the sausage.

16.text: Roll each rectangle over the sausages and seal them shut.

17.text: Chill the sausage rolls for 20 minutes.

18.text: Score the tops of each roll and brush them with egg wash.

19.text: Bake the mini-sausage rolls for 25 to 30 minutes.
